EXIT_pccc.cpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00013 #define TO_FILE
00014 
00015 #include "itpp/itcomm.h"
00016 #include "SISO.h"//SISO class
00017 #include "EXIT.h"//EXIT class
00018 #include "Progress_Timer.h"
00019 
00020 using namespace itpp;
00021 using tr::SISO;
00022 using tr::EXIT;
00023 using tr::threshold;
00024 using std::cout;
00025 using std::endl;
00026 using std::string;
00027 
00028 int main(void)
00029 {
00030     //general parameters
00031     vec sigmaA = "0.01:0.1:7";//standard deviation (sqrt(variance)) of the mutual a priori information
00032     double threshold_value = 50;
00033     string map_metric="logMAP";
00034     ivec gen = "037 021";//octal form
00035     int constraint_length = 5;
00036     int nb_blocks_lim = 10;
00037     int perm_len = int(itpp::pow10(5.0));//total number of bits in a block (with tail)
00038     double EbN0_dB = 0.8;
00039     double R = 1.0/3.0;//coding rate of PCCC
00040     double Ec = 1.0;//coded bit energy
00041     
00042     //other parameters
00043     vec sigma2A = sqr(sigmaA);
00044     int sigma2A_len = sigma2A.length();
00045     string filename = "Res/EXIT_pccc_"+map_metric+".it";
00046     int nb_bits = perm_len-(constraint_length-1);//number of bits in a block (without tail)
00047     double sigma2 = (0.5*Ec/R)*pow(inv_dB(EbN0_dB), -1.0);//N0/2
00048     double Lc = -2/sigma2;//normalisation factor for intrinsic information (take into account the BPSK modulation)
00049     bvec bits(nb_bits);
00050     bvec tail;
00051     bvec bits_tail(perm_len);
00052     bmat parity_bits;
00053     int coded_bits_len = 2*perm_len; 
00054     bvec coded_bits(coded_bits_len);
00055     vec mod_bits(coded_bits_len);
00056     vec rec_sig(coded_bits_len);
00057     vec intrinsic_coded(coded_bits_len);
00058     vec intrinsic_coded_p(2*nb_bits);
00059     intrinsic_coded_p.zeros();
00060     vec apriori_data(perm_len);    
00061     vec extrinsic_coded;
00062     vec extrinsic_data;
00063     vec apriori_mutual_info(sigma2A_len);
00064     vec extrinsic_mutual_info(sigma2A_len);
00065     vec extrinsic_mutual_info_p(sigma2A_len);
00066     extrinsic_mutual_info.zeros();
00067     extrinsic_mutual_info_p.zeros();
00068     register int en,n,nb_blocks;
00069     
00070     //Recursive Systematic Convolutional Code
00071     Rec_Syst_Conv_Code rsc;
00072     rsc.set_generator_polynomials(gen, constraint_length);//initial state should be the zero state
00073     
00074     //BPSK modulator
00075     BPSK bpsk;  
00076     
00077     //AWGN channel
00078     AWGN_Channel channel;
00079     channel.set_noise(sigma2);
00080 
00081     //SISO module
00082     SISO siso;
00083     siso.set_generators(gen, constraint_length);
00084     siso.set_map_metric(map_metric);
00085     
00086     //EXIT chart
00087     EXIT exit;
00088     
00089     //Progress timer
00090     tr::Progress_Timer timer;
00091     timer.set_max(sigma2A_len);
00092         
00093     //Randomize generators
00094     RNG_randomize();
00095     
00096     //main loop
00097     timer.progress(0.0);
00098     for (en=0;en<sigma2A_len;en++)
00099     {
00100         apriori_mutual_info(en) = exit.apriori_mutual_info(sigma2A(en));//a priori mutual info
00101         for (nb_blocks=0;nb_blocks<nb_blocks_lim;nb_blocks++)
00102         {
00103             //bits generation
00104             bits = randb(nb_bits);
00105 
00106             //RSC code
00107             rsc.encode_tail(bits, tail, parity_bits);//tail is added
00108             
00109             //form coder output
00110             bits_tail = concat(bits, tail);
00111             for (n=0;n<perm_len;n++)
00112             {
00113                 coded_bits(2*n) = bits_tail(n);//systematic output
00114                 coded_bits(2*n+1) = parity_bits(n,0);//parity output
00115             }               
00116 
00117             //BPSK modulation (1->-1,0->+1)
00118             mod_bits = bpsk.modulate_bits(coded_bits);
00119             
00120             //AWGN channel
00121             rec_sig = channel(mod_bits);
00122             
00123             //first SISO RSC module  (tail is added)
00124             //intrinsic info. of coded bits
00125             intrinsic_coded = Lc*rec_sig;
00126                         
00127             //a priori info. of data bits
00128             apriori_data = exit.generate_apriori_info(bits_tail);
00129 
00130             //SISO RSC module
00131             siso.rsc(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, intrinsic_coded, apriori_data, true);
00132             
00133             //threshold
00134             extrinsic_data = threshold(extrinsic_data, threshold_value);
00135 
00136             //extrinsic mutual info
00137             extrinsic_mutual_info(en) += exit.extrinsic_mutual_info(extrinsic_data.left(nb_bits), bits);
00138             
00139             //second SISO RSC module (no tail added)
00140             //intrinsic info. of coded bits
00141             for (n=0;n<nb_bits;n++)
00142                 intrinsic_coded_p(2*n+1) = Lc*rec_sig(2*n+1);//parity bits only
00143             
00144             //a priori info. of data bits
00145             apriori_data = exit.generate_apriori_info(bits);
00146             
00147             //SISO RSC module
00148             siso.rsc(extrinsic_coded, extrinsic_data, intrinsic_coded_p, apriori_data, false);
00149             
00150             //threshold
00151             extrinsic_data = threshold(extrinsic_data, threshold_value);
00152 
00153             //extrinsic mutual info
00154             extrinsic_mutual_info_p(en) += exit.extrinsic_mutual_info(extrinsic_data, bits);
00155         }//end blocks (while loop)
00156         
00157         //mean extrinsic mutual info over all blocks
00158         extrinsic_mutual_info(en) /= nb_blocks_lim;
00159         extrinsic_mutual_info_p(en) /= nb_blocks_lim;
00160 
00161         //show progress
00162         timer.progress(1+en);
00163     }
00164     timer.toc_print();
00165 
00166 #ifdef TO_FILE
00167     //save results to file
00168     it_file ff(filename);
00169     ff << Name("IA") << apriori_mutual_info;
00170     ff << Name("IE") << extrinsic_mutual_info;
00171     ff << Name("IE_p") << extrinsic_mutual_info_p;
00172     ff << Name("EbN0_dB") << EbN0_dB;
00173     ff << Name("gen") << gen;
00174     ff << Name("R") << R;
00175     ff << Name("perm_len") << perm_len;
00176     ff << Name("nb_blocks_lim") << nb_blocks_lim;
00177     ff.close();
00178 #else
00179     //show BER    
00180     cout << apriori_mutual_info << endl;
00181     cout << extrinsic_mutual_info << endl;
00182     cout << extrinsic_mutual_info_p << endl;
00183 #endif    
00184     
00185     return 0;
00186 }
